title: As startups flood the market with AI shopping agents, Amazon is playing defense by blocking agents' access to its site and investing heavily in its own tools (Annie Palmer/CNBC)
summary: Annie Palmer / CNBC: As startups flood the market with AI shopping agents, Amazon is playing defense by blocking agents' access to its site and investing heavily in its own tools â€” Amazon CEO Andy Jassy could see how dramatically artificial intelligence was altering e-commerce.
